description: A quiet and sweet student who has known Naoto since her childhood. During her childhood, Naoto and Rika don`t really get along. However, they became quite close friends over time. When Naoto became her boyfriend, she cried tears of joy. Asmodeus suddenly appears above a tree, attacking Rika with tentacles. Naoto tries his best to save Rika but is no match for the devils powers. Luvriel arrives to save the day, but is wounded in the process. Once the battle is over, Naoto takes Luvriel and Rika back to her apartment. Rika, worried about her health, wants to take Luvriel to the hospital. Luvriel awakens and tells Naoto and Rika a long story about the ongoing battle between Devils and Angels. Rika offers her assistance wanting to help, however she must lose her virginity first.
name: Manabe Rika
